Assets

If you wan’t your dev enviroment as pretty as live you will have to run the following apps: * npm install * bower install * grunt

HTML to Jade

If you wan’t convert HTML into Jade format you will have to run the following steps: * npm install -g html2jade * html2jade views/multiplus/html/*.html –outdir views/multiplus/
